mapper.insert:
insert into local.order_info(order_id, order_no, order_type, order_status, user_name, phone_number, goods_id, good_type, order_money, order_num, created_time, update_time, delete_status) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.orderStatus}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.goodsId}, #{entity.goodType}, #{entity.orderMoney}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteStatus})

insert into local.order_info(order_id, order_no, order_type, order_status, user_name, phone_number, goods_id, good_type, order_money, order_num, created_time, update_time, delete_status) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.orderStatus}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.goodsId}, #{entity.goodType}, #{entity.orderMoney}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteStatus})
on duplicate key update order_id = values(order_id) , order_no = values(order_no) , order_type = values(order_type) , order_status = values(order_status) , user_name = values(user_name) , phone_number = values(phone_number) , goods_id = values(goods_id) , good_type = values(good_type) , order_money = values(order_money) , order_num = values(order_num) , created_time = values(created_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , delete_status = values(delete_status)
